His revelation broke her heart afresh.Her husband had died, not of COVID-19‚Äîfor which he‚Äôd tested positive‚Äîbut of a heart attack left untreated for three weeks, records showed.She sucked in her breath in a ragged gasp when she heard that DeSantis hopes to allow hospital immunity to die in the state.‚ÄúI‚Äôve been on my knees before the Lord asking Him to make that [law] go away,‚Äù she told The Epoch Times through a rush of tears. ‚ÄúAccountability would happen if those laws were removed. It would bring justice.‚ÄúJust today, I prayed, and I said, ‚ÄòLord‚Ä¶‚ÄùHer voice trailed off, and she began to weep again. She knows she can‚Äôt sue the hospital that she believes killed her husband. But people have told her that Eric would be proud that she‚Äôs still fighting to change how hospitals treat COVID-19.And now, that just might happen.‚ÄúI‚Äôm just amazed,‚Äù she said, stifling a sob. ‚ÄúI do believe he‚Äôd be proud.‚Äù
_source.contentraw:
Part 3

For three weeks, Eric Schrock received treatment that strictly followed the CDC-approved protocols.

A year after his death, his widow asked an independent doctor to review the hospital records. His revelation broke her heart afresh.

Her husband had died, not of COVID-19‚Äîfor which he‚Äôd tested positive‚Äîbut of a heart attack left untreated for three weeks, records showed.

She sucked in her breath in a ragged gasp when she heard that DeSantis hopes to allow hospital immunity to die in the state.

‚ÄúI‚Äôve been on my knees before the Lord asking Him to make that [law] go away,‚Äù she told The Epoch Times through a rush of tears. ‚ÄúAccountability would happen if those laws were removed. It would bring justice.

‚ÄúJust today, I prayed, and I said, ‚ÄòLord‚Ä¶‚Äù

Her voice trailed off, and she began to weep again. She knows she can‚Äôt sue the hospital that she believes killed her husband. But people have told her that Eric would be proud that she‚Äôs still fighting to change how hospitals treat COVID-19.

And now, that just might happen.

‚ÄúI‚Äôm just amazed,‚Äù she said, stifling a sob. ‚ÄúI do believe he‚Äôd be proud.‚Äù

_source.content: One of the main reasons right off the bat as to why it‚Äôs prudent to avoid that cult known as ‚ÄúSecond Eighth Week Apostles‚Äù, or ‚ÄúS8W‚Äù for short:Here‚Äôs their main ‚Äúmotto‚Äù: ‚ÄúWHY WE PROPHESY CHRIST‚Äù. Prophesy?? There are no prophets today.Another main reason is their leader, Eric von Anderseck, touts himself as being ‚ÄúThe apostle to North America‚Äù. In other words, in order for you to hear from The Lord properly, you need to go through him ONLY. There are no apostles today. An apostle was one of the disciples who was an eyewitness to the ascension of Jesus. The apostle Paul was the lone exception to that scenario but Luke fully explains all of the ‚Äúwhys‚Äù and ‚Äúhows‚Äù around it when he wrote the book of Acts as well as in 1 Corinthians 5:5-8. Before his conversion on the Damascus Road, the apostle Paul was known as Saul of Tarsus.  James comes to mind. Simon Peter comes to mind. John comes to mind. Paul comes to mind. Jesus ascended into Heaven CENTURIES ago. There‚Äôs a big difference between an apostle and a disciple. 100% of everyone born again is a disciple. One fancy phrase for a disciple would be, ‚Äú...a student of...‚Äù After that would come human servants. Those can be read about in 1 Corinthians 3:5-9, Ephesians 4:11-16 and so on. Someone who conducts a regular Bible study would be more of a teacher. Someone who penned a portion of The Bible would be called an apostle.A couple of websites which may be of interest:http://studyoncults.blogspot.com/2008/03/false-apostle-eric-von-anderseck.htmlhttps://carm.org/why-write-about-apostle-eric-vonanderseckAccording to Ephesians 5:11, instructions are to have nothing to do with the deeds of darkness but rather expose them and according to 1 John 4:1, instructions are to test the spirits.Over the years, there has been quite a lot taught about Christianity. The problem is, many of those things simply are not in The Bible. Makes one wonder at times - Human opinion versus GOD THE FATHER‚Äôs opinion...Wonder who would win? Additionally, Mosaic Law and/or other types of Legalism - Sad, huh? One thing to also remember is that there are dozens of each, cults and false religions. Many of them have done a SPECTACULAR job of messing up the Gospel message with either bogus teachings, fake literature based on fake Bibles and so on.Since groups are public settings, therefore who knows who sees what, sometimes love must be tough. The desire is for everyone to hit as close to 100% as possible of everything for which GOD THE FATHER created that person, self included. No one is perfect and there is no one righteous...AT ALL (Isaiah 64:6, John 8:7, Romans 3:10-12, Romans 3:21-26).As long as a person is able to identify from the heart with the death, burial and resurrection of Jesus...ONLY...that person is justified (Galatians 2:20-21, Romans 5:10, Romans 6:5, 2 Corinthians 5:17). Anything above and beyond that is merely some human attempting to push some ‚Äúreligion‚Äù, or ‚Äúsin management‚Äù, or ‚Äúman-plan‚Äù. According to Romans 6:17-18, someone born again (or ‚Äúborn from above‚Äù ‚Äì or ‚Äúborn anew‚Äù ‚Äì John 3:1-6 ‚Äì https://biblehub.com/greek/509.htm ) becomes obedient from the heart. The $10,000 question to ask would be one of MOTIVE - WHY do you do what you do? One doesn‚Äôt HAVE TO do things pertaining to Christianity, he or she GETS to. HUMONGOUS difference.) EVERYONE needs a savior (1 John 1:8-10).Rather than ask, ‚ÄúWhat would Jesus do?‚Äù Perhaps instead inquire as to what He may be doing in you. It‚Äôs more accurate and allowing Him to live in you is more feasible than merely trying to imitate behavior(s).‚Äú...and the truth shall set you free‚Äù (John 8:31-32). (Proverbs 3:5-6, Proverbs 27:17, Hebrews 4:12, Hebrews 10:14, Jude 1:23, etc. are additional motives.)(SIDE NOTE ‚Äì The term ‚ÄúChrist‚Äù is a title, not a name. It means either ‚ÄúThe Anointed One‚Äù or ‚ÄúMessiah‚Äù.)Psalm 118:8 implies that it‚Äôs better to trust in GOD THE FATHER than it is to put confidence in man.‚ÄúTo sanctify‚Äù means ‚Äúto set apart‚Äù. ‚ÄúTo put to its intended purpose,‚Äù in other words.In Hebrews 10:14, ‚ÄúFor all time‚Äù means (may I have a drumroll, please) ‚ÄúFor all time‚Äù. (That‚Äôs spiritually-speaking, or course. The rest of you? Welcome to being human.)(ANOTHER SIDE NOTE ‚Äì In some translations, ‚ÄúFor all time‚Äù is worded as ‚ÄúForever‚Äù, ‚ÄúTo the end‚Äù or ‚ÄúFor eternity‚Äù.)
_source.contentraw:
One of the main reasons right off the bat as to why it‚Äôs prudent to avoid that cult known as ‚ÄúSecond Eighth Week Apostles‚Äù, or ‚ÄúS8W‚Äù for short:
Here‚Äôs their main ‚Äúmotto‚Äù: ‚ÄúWHY WE PROPHESY CHRIST‚Äù. Prophesy?? There are no prophets today.

Another main reason is their leader, Eric von Anderseck, touts himself as being ‚ÄúThe apostle to North America‚Äù. In other words, in order for you to hear from The Lord properly, you need to go through him ONLY. There are no apostles today. An apostle was one of the disciples who was an eyewitness to the ascension of Jesus. The apostle Paul was the lone exception to that scenario but Luke fully explains all of the ‚Äúwhys‚Äù and ‚Äúhows‚Äù around it when he wrote the book of Acts as well as in 1 Corinthians 5:5-8. Before his conversion on the Damascus Road, the apostle Paul was known as Saul of Tarsus. James comes to mind. Simon Peter comes to mind. John comes to mind. Paul comes to mind. Jesus ascended into Heaven CENTURIES ago. There‚Äôs a big difference between an apostle and a disciple. 100% of everyone born again is a disciple. One fancy phrase for a disciple would be, ‚Äú...a student of...‚Äù After that would come human servants. Those can be read about in 1 Corinthians 3:5-9, Ephesians 4:11-16 and so on. Someone who conducts a regular Bible study would be more of a teacher. Someone who penned a portion of The Bible would be called an apostle.

A couple of websites which may be of interest:

http://studyoncults.blogspot.com/2008/03/false-apostle-eric-von-anderseck.html

https://carm.org/why-write-about-apostle-eric-vonanderseck

According to Ephesians 5:11, instructions are to have nothing to do with the deeds of darkness but rather expose them and according to 1 John 4:1, instructions are to test the spirits.

Over the years, there has been quite a lot taught about Christianity. The problem is, many of those things simply are not in The Bible. Makes one wonder at times - Human opinion versus GOD THE FATHER‚Äôs opinion...Wonder who would win? Additionally, Mosaic Law and/or other types of Legalism - Sad, huh? One thing to also remember is that there are dozens of each, cults and false religions. Many of them have done a SPECTACULAR job of messing up the Gospel message with either bogus teachings, fake literature based on fake Bibles and so on.

Since groups are public settings, therefore who knows who sees what, sometimes love must be tough. The desire is for everyone to hit as close to 100% as possible of everything for which GOD THE FATHER created that person, self included. No one is perfect and there is no one righteous...AT ALL (Isaiah 64:6, John 8:7, Romans 3:10-12, Romans 3:21-26).

As long as a person is able to identify from the heart with the death, burial and resurrection of Jesus...ONLY...that person is justified (Galatians 2:20-21, Romans 5:10, Romans 6:5, 2 Corinthians 5:17). Anything above and beyond that is merely some human attempting to push some ‚Äúreligion‚Äù, or ‚Äúsin management‚Äù, or ‚Äúman-plan‚Äù. According to Romans 6:17-18, someone born again (or ‚Äúborn from above‚Äù ‚Äì or ‚Äúborn anew‚Äù ‚Äì John 3:1-6 ‚Äì https://biblehub.com/greek/509.htm ) becomes obedient from the heart. The $10,000 question to ask would be one of MOTIVE - WHY do you do what you do? One doesn‚Äôt HAVE TO do things pertaining to Christianity, he or she GETS to. HUMONGOUS difference.) EVERYONE needs a savior (1 John 1:8-10).

Rather than ask, ‚ÄúWhat would Jesus do?‚Äù Perhaps instead inquire as to what He may be doing in you. It‚Äôs more accurate and allowing Him to live in you is more feasible than merely trying to imitate behavior(s).

‚Äú...and the truth shall set you free‚Äù (John 8:31-32). (Proverbs 3:5-6, Proverbs 27:17, Hebrews 4:12, Hebrews 10:14, Jude 1:23, etc. are additional motives.)

(SIDE NOTE ‚Äì The term ‚ÄúChrist‚Äù is a title, not a name. It means either ‚ÄúThe Anointed One‚Äù or ‚ÄúMessiah‚Äù.)

Psalm 118:8 implies that it‚Äôs better to trust in GOD THE FATHER than it is to put confidence in man.

‚ÄúTo sanctify‚Äù means ‚Äúto set apart‚Äù. ‚ÄúTo put to its intended purpose,‚Äù in other words.
In Hebrews 10:14, ‚ÄúFor all time‚Äù means (may I have a drumroll, please) ‚ÄúFor all time‚Äù. (That‚Äôs spiritually-speaking, or course. The rest of you? Welcome to being human.)
(ANOTHER SIDE NOTE ‚Äì In some translations, ‚ÄúFor all time‚Äù is worded as ‚ÄúForever‚Äù, ‚ÄúTo the end‚Äù or ‚ÄúFor eternity‚Äù.)

Ron Hubbard of Scientology, Ellen G. White of Seventh Day Adventism, Eric vonAnderseck of Second Eighth Week Apostles and so on. Additionally, there are no contradictions in Scripture...EVER. _source.content: Seven Antifa Militants Charged With Domestic TerrorismSeven out-of-state ANTIFA domestic terrorists from the group Stop Cop Atlanta have been charged with domestic terrorism and criminal trespass charges.Of the seven, one was killed during a deadly shootout at Atlanta‚Äôs ‚Äòcop city‚Äô and has been identified as Manuel Esteban Paez Teran, 26.The 26-year-old was shot dead after allegedly opening fire at a Georgia State Patrol trooper during a ‚Äòclearing operation‚Äô of the so-called autonomous zone at the site of a future $90 million Atlanta Public Safety Training Center on Wednesday.Since June 2021, Antifa and other far-left extremists from across the US have occupied the area to prevent the construction of what they‚Äôve dubbed ‚Äòcop city.‚ÄôThe Georgia Bureau of Investigations (GBI) said a Georgia State Patrol trooper was shot and severely injured during the raid by a man camped in the area. Officers returned fire and killed the gunman, who allegedly used a pistol.The Post Millennial‚Äôs Andy Ngo is reporting:On Wednesday morning, the Georgia Bureau of Investigation and other law enforcement agencies conducted a raid on the so-called autonomous zone at the site of the future Atlanta Public Safety Training Center. Since June 2021, Antifa and other far-left extremists from across the US have occupied the area to prevent the construction of what they call a ‚Äúcop city.‚Äù The GBI says a Georgia State Patrol trooper was shot and severely injured during Wednesday‚Äôs raid by a man camped in the area. Seven Antifa Militants Charged With Domestic Terrorism

Seven out-of-state ANTIFA domestic terrorists from the group Stop Cop Atlanta have been charged with domestic terrorism and criminal trespass charges.

Of the seven, one was killed during a deadly shootout at Atlanta‚Äôs ‚Äòcop city‚Äô and has been identified as Manuel Esteban Paez Teran, 26.

The 26-year-old was shot dead after allegedly opening fire at a Georgia State Patrol trooper during a ‚Äòclearing operation‚Äô of the so-called autonomous zone at the site of a future $90 million Atlanta Public Safety Training Center on Wednesday.

Since June 2021, Antifa and other far-left extremists from across the US have occupied the area to prevent the construction of what they‚Äôve dubbed ‚Äòcop city.‚Äô

The Georgia Bureau of Investigations (GBI) said a Georgia State Patrol trooper was shot and severely injured during the raid by a man camped in the area. Officers returned fire and killed the gunman, who allegedly used a pistol.

The Post Millennial‚Äôs Andy Ngo is reporting:

On Wednesday morning, the Georgia Bureau of Investigation and other law enforcement agencies conducted a raid on the so-called autonomous zone at the site of the future Atlanta Public Safety Training Center. Since June 2021, Antifa and other far-left extremists from across the US have occupied the area to prevent the construction of what they call a ‚Äúcop city.‚Äù The GBI says a Georgia State Patrol trooper was shot and severely injured during Wednesday‚Äôs raid by a man camped in the area. Officers returned fire and killed the gunman, who allegedly used a pistol.

Georgia‚Äôs Department of Public Safety will not name the injured patrol trooper, saying it would ‚Äúcompromise security against criminal or terroristic acts due to retaliation,‚Äù but told local media he was in the ICU after having emergency surgery.

The deceased gunman was named on Thursday by the GBI as 26-year-old Manuel Esteban Paez Teran. He used the alias ‚ÄúTort‚Äù and ‚ÄúTortuguita.

‚ÄúManuel used they/it pronouns‚Ä¶please make sure we are remembering them properly and respectfully,‚Äù wrote the Atlanta Community Press Collective in their statement revealing the shooter‚Äôs identity.

Following the shooting, the GBI and its law enforcement partners continued to clear the autonomous zone and several arrests were made of suspects‚Äîall of whom are from out of state.

The GBI said they confiscated a cache of weapons that include mortar-style fireworks and edged weapons.

Matthew Ernest Macar, 30, Spencer Bernard Liberto, 29, and Sarah Wasilewski, 35, all from Pittsburgh, are each facing charges of domestic terrorism and aggravated assault upon a public safety officer.

A fourth suspect who would not identify himself in jail was later identified as 20-year-old Geoffrey D. Parson, of Baltimore.

Additionally, Timothy A. Murphy, 25, of Rockport, Maine, Christopher Reynolds, 31, of Dayton, Ohio, and Teresa Yue Shen, 31, of Brooklyn, New York, were charged with domestic terrorism.

See also BREAKING: Biden Admits He Kept No Visitor Logs In Home Where Classified Docs Were Found

The shooting and four arrests on Wednesday follow another raid last month on the autonomous zone that resulted in six others being charged with domestic terrorism.

Marjorie Taylor Greene (MTG) goes establishment, lashes out at Matt Gaetz on twitter

Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) slammed Rep. Matt Gaetz (R-FL) online over the events that took place during the battle for who would be the next Speaker of the House of Representatives.

Greene has quickly departed from the outspoken anti-establishment wing of the Republican party falling in line with the establishment led by Speaker McCarthy.

Her acquiescing to the majority has elevated her in the GOP, quickly garnering her a few coveted committee appointments.

Gaetz who until recently was considered to be of the same ilk as Greene congratulated the congresswoman for gaining spots on key committees after Democrats forced her off her committee assignments during her first term in Congress. Marjorie Taylor Greene (MTG) And Rep. Gosar Score Important Committee Seats

‚ÄúBravo @mtgreenee!‚Äù Gaetz tweeted. ‚ÄúShe‚Äôs going to do amazing work for the people on these key committees she has EARNED. ‚ÄòRep. MTG of Georgia is back on committee assignments now that Republicans have retaken the House and the Rep. Gaetz-led revolt has put some steel in McCarthy‚Äôs spine.‚Äô‚Äù

Greene surprisingly lashed out, ‚ÄúThanks to @SpeakerMcCarthy & Steering for voting me on the committees I requested on the submission form most of us filled out.‚Äù

‚ÄúToo bad we‚Äôre weeks behind after you spent a week only getting MTV from 5 to 1,‚Äù Greene continued. ‚ÄúAs the leading MAGA voice in Congress, I look forward to committees.‚Äù

Greene declaring herself, ‚Äòthe leading MAGA voice in Congress‚Äô shows a disconnect from those who have been avid supporters of her the past few years.

The remark from the 48-year-old lawmaker, who is in the midst of a divorce following multiple affairs against her husband, is not sitting well with those in the MAGA movement looking for those displaying a passion for faith, family, and country.

MTV stands for ‚Äúmotion to vacate.‚Äù It previously took multiple members of Congress to bring forward a motion to vote on the ousting of the Speaker of the House, but now it will only take a single member. According to NBC News, ‚ÄúThe threshold for bringing a motion to vacate stayed at just a single member of Congress until 2019 when Democrats took the majority,‚Äù and raised the threshold.

Gaetz seemed stunned by Greene‚Äôs response, writing: ‚ÄúWell, we got a few other things but I‚Äôm thrilled the MTV is back to the pre-Pelosi standard. Totally worth it!‚Äù

‚ÄúWe the People will be in better hands with MTG holding the corrupt Biden Admin accountable via committee service,‚Äù he continued. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm so here for it.‚Äù

‚ÄúThe rules package did not change at all from Jan 1st to Jan 6th, except MTV went from 5 to 1,‚Äù Greene responded. ‚ÄúLiterally anyone can read them online and see that. All substantial negotiations happened in conference & 5 families meetings before the 15 ballots starting on Jan 3rd.‚Äù

Well, Gaetz just got a harsh reminder that the swamp doesn‚Äôt tolerate dissenters, and eventually they wear down those with principles, bringing them fully into the establishment‚Äôs fold.
